channel.title: DM1 for Mac OS and iOS just updated
channel.description:
Not sure if anyone else here uses it, but DM1, one of the best – and most fun – drum machine apps for iOS and Mac OS, just dropped a significant update for the Mac OS version. (Presumably these new features will appear in
http://fingerlab.net/portfolio/dm1 https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/dm1-the-drum-machine/id522349879?mt=12
It has a shedload of vintage drum machine kits and some great custom, sample-based kits. It also allows you to create your own kits using any of the hundreds of sounds in the app – or your samples.
It's a great way to extend your Auxy productions, if you're one of those bringing your project stems in to other apps/DAWs.
